findings.title: Wrong minting
findings.description: The function _mint() does not increase total supply when minting tokens and does not set total cap to prevent unlimited minting.

findings.title: Potential unlimited minting
findings.description: The _mint() function does not increase total supply when minting tokens and does not set total cap to prevent unlimited minting.

findings.title: Wrong owner unlock
findings.description: Owner can lock ownership but the unlock function is allowed to call only by the owner, since the owner is zero address, nobody could call this function.
